overview: Ayako belongs to a small theatre troupe, and she is drinking at a bar with her friend Miki. Then, her boyfriend Tatsuo, who she is on the verge of ditching, shows up uninvited. Socially inept Tetsuo ruins the mood, and he and punch-drunk Ayako proceed to vent their mutual discontent and hurl invectives at each other.
title: Wolf na sissi
